column4: tried installing 7.10 last night. got to the boot screen, then started to get hundreds of errors after selecting install. [290.xxxxx] SQUASHFS .......... any ideas? Disk is good, image is good, and I burned at 1x....??!!

tried installing 7.10 last night. got to the boot screen, then started to get hundreds of errors after selecting install. [290.xxxxx] SQUASHFS .......... any ideas? Disk is good, image is good, and I burned at 1x....??!!
SquashFS is the entire Filesystem on dish, If it can't read that you can try installing from the alt-install disk (no live option)
well if you can't get past em you can't read em
